name: Let's Cook
description:
You can try the restaurant simulation with your friends online or locally.



You can enter with a maximum of 16 people.



You can play alone if you want (it will be difficult.).



You will enter with your friends and manage the restaurant by working as both a waiter and a cook.



You will buy the necessary materials in the kitchen from the market with in-game money (not real money) and quickly prepare the incoming orders in the kitchen and manage the restaurant.
